summary: The necromancer amulet without enchantement. Craftable in 3 different version (normal, light armor and heavy armor). Enchantable like any other necklace.
descriptionHtml:
NEW VERSION CLEANED WITH TESVEDIT (no more references to DRAGONBORN)

• Can be created at any forge under jewelery section
• Comes in normal, light armor and heavy armor version
• Can be tempered (for the light and heavy version) at workbench table
• Enchantable like any other necklace or amulet (same slot)
• Appear as "Skeleton Amulet" or "Skeleton Amulet (light)" or "Skeleton Amulet (heavy)" in your crafting, enchanting and inventory menu
• You will need 1 flawess emarald, 1 leatherstrip and 1 quicksilver ingot to craft each one of this amulets, and only 1 quicksilver ingot to temper them
• For those who doesn't want to craft, type: help amulet in the console to obtain ID

[size=3][b]INSTALL[/b][/size]
• Use NMM
or
• Manual install: Put SkeletonAmulet.esp in your data directory... blablabla
Feel free to comment or report any bug
Thank you

I made this one for myself and I decided to share it with other person who could like it.
Match perfectly with Celes Nightingale armor (in my opinion). See screenshot and make your own opinion
My first mod :) Hope not so bugy

[b][size=3]INFO
[/size][/b][size=2]more armored amulets of skyrim[/size]
